description: Triangle of numbers a(n,k) = number of permutations on n letters containing k 3-sequences (n >= 2, 0<=k<=n-2).
links: J. Riordan, Permutations without 3-sequences, Bull. Amer. Math. Soc., 51 (1945), 745-748.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
